messages.subject: Re: t shirts
messages.msgSnippet: 2 Cool 4 School, our family s online t-shirt shop, has unschooling t- shirts. http://www.cafepress.com/2cool4school While you re there, sign up for the
messages.messageBody:
2 Cool 4 School, our family's online t-shirt shop, has unschooling t-
shirts.

http://www.cafepress.com/2cool4school

While you're there, sign up for the newsletter since we're going to
be expanding (more designs, colors and products) in the fall and will
be sending out notice.

Holly

--- In Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com, "Mary" <mummy124@b...>
wrote:
> Anyone know of any unschooling t shirts I can get a hold off? I
know NHEN has them but that's not exactly what I'm looking for.
Something direct and simple. Just not into designing my own right
now. I've searched google and can't find what I'm looking for.
>
> Mary b

Anyone know of any unschooling t shirts I can get a hold off? I know NHEN has them but that's not exactly what I'm looking for. Something direct and simple. Just not into designing my own right now. I've searched google and can't find what I'm looking for.

Mary b
